channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Yes, social workers can earn six-figures. Here are the top-paying companies right now
item.description: Social work isn’t traditionally associated with high-paying careers, but rising demand has led to some relatively high-paying social worker jobs.

item.title: Citi's post-pullback stock shopping list: Where to go after market sell-off
item.description: Investors looking to sift through the sell-off should look for stocks that can withstand an economic shakeout, according to Citi.

item.title: The ‘short volatility’ trade has finally blown up. Investors may not pile in.
Tim Walz and JD Vance agree on something: Diet Mountain Dew. But is the non-partisan pop healthy?
item.description: The chartreuse soda contains three artificial sweeteners and various additives. How safe are they?

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Fortinet, Shopify, Lyft and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: This Japan fund has set its sights on its best day in two years
Exclusive: Crypto vet Meltem Demirors raising $75 million for two venture funds under Crucible Capital
item.description: Demirors has carved out a prominent voice in the digital assets sector through her angel investing and vocal Twitter presence.

item.title: Warren Buffett now owns more T-bills than the Federal Reserve
item.description: The Omaha-based conglomerate held $234.6 billion in short-term investments in Treasury bills by the end of the second quarter.

item.title: Immigration boosts federal tax revenue. It’s another story for states.
Costco members will soon have to scan membership cards upon entrance
In a reversal, Disney's media assets are starting to generate more excitement than its parks
item.description: For the first time in more than two years, Disney's media assets are outshining the parks division.

item.title: The Cboe volatility gauge ‘VIX’ has now returned to week-ago levels
Mitsubishi discontinues the Mirage, eliminating a bargain option for new car shoppers
Sunrun sees market opportunity after SunPower files for bankruptcy, company's shares surge
item.description: Sunrun posted a surprise profit and sees opportunity to gain market share.

item.title: Dow jumps 300 points after Bank of Japan soothes global nerves — live coverage
